data.title: Emma McMillan – Thomas Mansfield Family Law
data.meta_description: Emma is a Paralegal in the Family team at Thomas Mansfield Solicitors. Emma assists our legal team in various areas of family law including divorce,
data.text:
Emma McMillan

Paralegal

Emma is a Paralegal in the Family team at Thomas Mansfield Solicitors.

Emma assists our legal team in various areas of family law including divorce, complex financial remedy disputes and child arrangement matters, which often have an international dimension.

Emma’s primary responsibilities involve client liaison and managing correspondence, drafting court applications and preparing legal documents, such as briefs to counsel.

Emma is committed to achieving excellent client care through her empathetic and understanding approach towards all clients’ circumstances, whilst managing expectations.

Emma joined Thomas Mansfield Solicitors in June 2023, having graduated with a law degree from the University of Exeter.

Client testimonials

Reshma was available to listen at a time when I needed the reassurance. From our initial chats her expertise and confidence were enough to put my mind at rest.

Client, UK

The process of a getting divorced is unpleasant and unfamiliar, and so it is important to have quality, compassionate and clear advice. Thomas Mansfield offered this in abundance and together we were able to navigate the unsavoury business as efficiently and as effectively possible.

Client, UK

Excellent matrimonial and family law advisors and advocates.

Client, UK

Simplicity, listening and professionalism! At a very stressful time (involving French and UK laws) the whole process was made clear, helpful and concise.

Client, UK & France

From the minute I walked through the door I was greeted with a warm welcome. This helped put me at ease during a meeting that potentially was very daunting and difficult. Susi was kind, listened intently and offered very professional and informative advice.

Client, UK

Thomas Mansfield Solicitors ‘has expertise and great strength in all areas of family law’, with ‘solicitors of outstanding ability at a range of fee levels to meet the client’s circumstances.’

Legal 500, 2023

Efficient team, easy to work with – they have gone above and beyond to help in my case.

Client, UK

Reshma was highly recommended to me by a friend. She has great knowledge and was able to answer all my questions in a way that didn’t feel overwhelming despite their sensitive nature... I felt empowered and have a far greater idea of what to expect going forward and how we will achieve the best outcome.

Client, UK

The team have been amazing, explained everything along the way and gave me great advice with my international divorce.

Client, France

Thomas Mansfield has an exceptional and highly collaborative team. Whenever my key point of contact has been away, issues are quickly picked up and dealt with by other members of the team, all of whom appear to have a great, collective and collaborative understanding of their clients’ issues.

Client, UK

The customer service was reliable, efficient and friendly. The legal advice received was good, and reflected in court. The lead on the case was available for phone calls, and easily contactable... Although a lengthy procedure, a final fair and successful result.

Client, UK

Thomas Mansfield has an established reputation for providing excellent representation and client care, while keeping fee levels transparent and reasonable.

Legal 500, 2022

Their responses are always prompt and the team is attentive.

Client, UK

Great service and advice received throughout the entire divorce process.

Client, UK

I have been comforted by excellent insight and a calm and effective service. The team provides succinct communication which is action-orientated and targeted towards the objective.

Client, UK

All the staff I had dealings were very professional and approachable. I would highly recommend Thomas Mansfield Family Law.

Client, UK

TM Family Law have given great advice, clear explanations and been very thorough and professional in their work.

Client, UK

These past few months have been extremely stressful, but knowing Hollie is there to help me navigate these difficult divorce waters has helped me immensely.

Client, UK

The family team at Thomas Mansfield are a group of excellent lawyers who provide the best possible mix of knowledge, invaluable experience, sound and reliable advice, efficiency, commitment and support.

Legal 500, 2023
